experience.name: University of Washington
experience.title: Sr. Computer Specialist
experience.description: Build, Maintain, and Administer the on-premise Atlassian DataCenter Suite of products. Including developing and maintaining custom integration and authentication plugins. Revamping existing documentation for Atlassian products, including User / Admin Guides, How Tos and Best Practices. Managing & Supporting the Enterprise GitHub Account.

experience.name: Enchanted Rose Innovations
experience.title: Founder / Lead Developer
experience.description: I started ERI when a close friend approached me with a need for a custom website and a platform to deliver recorded lessons for a class they taught. In the time since that platform has evolved into Acolyte, and this is the business name in which I develop and license Acolyte under.

experience.name: Carbon Robotics
experience.title: Sr. Support Engineer
experience.description: As the Sr. Support Engineer and the first support hire I worked closely with the Directory of Support to build and guide the team to success. Expanding support coverage from 5x10 to 7x24, implementing new hire training & onboarding resources. I authored the initial support runbooks and troubleshooting documentation by analyzing sourcecode and extrapolating points of failure and custom commands from the product. I also served as the "Support Program Manager" and Jira Administrator/Architect implementing and desiging the companies Atlassian Products. I developed a standalone Laravel application for support account management and collaborated with Product Management and Engineering for an MVP that would later be rewritten in TypeScript, React, and Go using gRPC to connect with existing infrastructure. I also assisted the Director with the implementation of Tableau as the primary data analysis tool, desiging and implementing initial data flows. With that I helped automate the weekly customer reports taking the manual creation time of over 8+ hours a week to just under 1 hour for review.

experience.name: Coupa Software
experience.title: L3 Advanced Support Engineer
experience.description: Rebuilt and implemented the internal product knowledge and technical support knowledge base(s). Overhauled training and onboarding processes globally, resulting in a 45% increase in positive new hire training feedback. Involved in the QA and Smoke testing process, reviewing code for potential bugs and providing suggested solutions to engineer. Analyzed and addressed issues using tools such as Kibana, Grafana, MySQL, Ruby and Rails. Provided indepth technical analysis of complex errors and provided cause/effect analysis to engineering. Delivered technical training to Senior Technical Support Engineers in collaboration with cross-organizational management.
